name: Targus AMW55US Wireless Laser Mouse
Features: The Targus Wireless Compact Laser Mouse features a three button device built for comfort and durability. The Wireless Compact mouse is ideal for the on-the-go laptop user. With its lightweight and Stow-NGo design, it easily packs for travel. It also eliminates the clutter of wires and cords due to the micro USB receiver. Featuring 2.4 GHz, it provides a stronger wireless signal for excellent tracking and five times greater range compared to most 27 MHz models. This mouse comes equipped with 2 AAA Energizer Max batteries for up to five months of battery life depending on frequency of use. The 1000 DPI high-precision laser technology makes this mouse 20x more accurate compared with other optical mice. It accurately responds to mouse movements making this mouse the right choice for portability and accuracy.
